title: Team Members
text:
Roman S.
Hi everyone! My name is Roman and I’m a sophomore. Some of you may know me from our school’s band program, others from class or just seeing me around. Some of my favorite things to do include playing drums, piano, flute, baseball, and hockey. I joined this club because I’m deeply concerned about the constant gun violence tragedies that take lives almost every day. Gun violence and drug issues are as significant as COVID, which is why it’s important we raise awareness and take action against them.



Sawyer



Mia M.
Hey! My name is Mia, and I am a sophomore at McLean. I sing operatically, and am part of McLean’s choral program. I actively participate in Model UN and Mock Trial. I am a part of UAGV because I believe that every student has a right to an education without fearing for their lives.


Director, Partnerships
Xavier R.

title: About
text:
Our primary objective is to foster a safe and inclusive environment
where students can stand up against gun violence through advocacy, event organization, and
meaningful dialogue. By cultivating empathy, understanding, and a spirit of activism, our club
aims to inspire positive change and advocate for peaceful solutions to address the multifaceted
issue of gun violence. Together, as members of the United Against Gun Violence Club, we strive
to create a safer future for all students andA brief description of the project’s mission

title: THE UNITED AGAINST GUN VIOLENCE CLUB (UAGV CLUB) OF MCLEAN HIGH SCHOOL
text:
The United Against Gun Violence Club at McLean High School is a passionate group of students
dedicated to raising awareness, promoting education, and actively combating gun violence
within our community.
